CreatedTime.description: The time when the disk was created

KeyValueList.description: Additional key-value pairs associated with this disk

TagList.description: A list of tags associated with this disk

Fingerprint.description: Unique identifier for the public key

TagList.description: List of tags associated with this KeyPair

StartTime.description: Timezone: based on cloud-barista server location.

VMSpecName.description: instance type or flavour, etc... ex) t2.micro or f1.micro

spider.VMStatus.description: The status of a Virtual Machine (VM).

IDTransformMode.description: ON: transform CSP ID, OFF: no-transform CSP ID

Zone.description: target zone for the subnet, if not specified, it will be created in the same zone as the Connection.

IDTransformMode.description: ON: transform CSP ID, OFF: no-transform CSP ID

Zone.description: target zone for the subnet, if not specified, it will be created in the same zone as the Connection.

IDTransformMode.description: ON: transform CSP ID, OFF: no-transform CSP ID

DiskSize.description: 100 or default, if not specified, default is used (unit is GB)

DiskType.description: gp2 or default, if not specified, default is used

Zone.description: target zone for the disk, if not specified, it will be created in the same zone as the Connection.

IDTransformMode.description: ON: transform CSP ID, OFF: no-transform CSP ID
ON: transform CSP ID, OFF: no-transform CSP ID
ON: transform CSP ID, OFF: no-transform CSP ID
ON: transform CSP ID, OFF: no-transform CSP ID

DataDiskNames.description: Data disks in the same zone as this VM

RootDiskSize.description: 100 or default, if not specified, default is used (unit is GB)

RootDiskType.description: gp2 or default, if not specified, default is used
